column2: an A.M. Eatery////There has been a lot of buzz this past week about this spot so of course I had to give it a try. I was worried there would be a line out the door
column3: but we were lucky and only had to wait about 30 minutes. I ordered the Ham Benedict and my friend ordered the Breakfast Frittata. Just to spice it up
column4: we added one Cinnamon Roll Pancake. HOLY MOLES YOU GUYS
column5: that pancake! It had the perfect level of sweetness
column6: great use of pecans and a richness from the dark chocolate chips. Don't get me wrong
column7: the egg dishes we were great but the star was that one delicious pancake! The staff was friendly
column8: excited and very attentive. So happy to have Snooze in the neighborhood!
